name: FATHOM COMMANDER
description:
Venture out into the dark depths of an alien ocean fighting off savage creatures.

Summary

Fathom Commander is a submarine simulation where you manage a crew of starving desperate sailors to reach the bottom of the ocean. Throughout, you will encounter unimaginable horrors and find others to help serve your cause. You are the commander, you decide their fates.

 Features
  •  Command a submarine crew.
  •  Scan for treasure.
  • Manage oxygen supply to keep the crew alive.
  • Repair damaged rooms to stay in the fight.
  • Boost your engines to escape danger.
  • Dive to the deepest of depths.
Made for Ludum Dare 48 by

Adam Martin - Programmer 

Meg Ridl - Music/Sound FX

Josh Dean - 3D Modeler

Brian Howey - 3D modeler

Wren Tipparach - Programmer

Ruben Tipparach - Programmer
